uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools
Class SelectionManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.SelectionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class SelectionManager
extends java.awt.Component

Handles feature selection. redesigned 8/Jul/99 for much more flexibility. note: invert selection and select all are not possible as the full range of ids is not always known

Version:
0.6.1
Author:
James Macgill This code is (c)James Macgill and is covered by the GPL.
See Also:
